form.tooltip: You must provide proof of sufficient financial resources (greater than or equal to 615 € monthly)
form.document.title: Attach your documents
form.resourceProof.placeholder: Click or drag your proof here...
form.resourceProof.tooltip: Thank you to attach proof of greater than or equal to 615 € monthly financial resources (bank statement, pay stubs, proof of scholarship)
form.inscriptionCertificate.placeholder: Click or drag your certificate here...
form.inscriptionCertificate.tooltip: Thank you to attach proof of registration or pre- registration with an educational institution

resources.title: Resources
resources.yes: Yes, I authorize the administration of foreigners in France to get my supporting resource directly from URSSAF. I have then no supporting piece to attach to my request.
resources.no: No, I want to justify myself by my resources. Then I have to join my request supporting documents requested of me.
resources.no.tooltip: If applicable, attach: employment contract, certificate of past employment, employment certificate pole, the last 3 payslips, November and December payslips of the last three years.
resources.workContract.placeholder: Click or drag your contract here...
resources.workCertificate.placeholder: Click or drag your certificate here...
resources.paySlip.placeholder: Click or drag your slip here...

taxSituation.title: Tax situation
taxSituation.yes: Yes, I authorize the administration of foreigners in France to recover my tax receipts directly from the Public Finance. I have then no supporting piece to attach to my request.
taxSituation.yes.done: Data exchange with Public Finance authorized
taxSituation.no: No, I want to justify my tax situation without allowing sharing my information with the Ministry of Finance. Then I have to join my request supporting documents requested of me.
taxSituation.no.tooltip: If applicable, attach: recent P237 tax situation slip on the imposition of the past three years and tax notice last 3 years.
taxSituation.taxSlip.placeholder: Click or drag your slip here...
taxSituation.taxNotice.placeholder: Click or drag your notice here...
